EmailTemplate.name: 12_1_14 Jamboree Birkett.Email_plain
EmailTemplate.subject: {{Lead.First Name:default=}}'s Invitation: Tech Disruptors Holiday Jamboree with Pure Storage, Zerto, and VMTurbo
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{Lead.First Name:default=Sir or Madam}},
I want to personally invite you to the Tech Disruptors Holiday Jamboree <http://pages.zerto.com/2014HolidayJamboree.html> at Dolce Cubano in Stamford, CT on December 10.
Join Pure Storage, Zerto, and VMTurbo at Dolce Cubano for a fun holiday networking Jamboree, where we will sip on egg nog, eat great food and entertain you with some great knowledge from these three tech disruptors.
Register Here <http://pages.zerto.com/2014HolidayJamboree.html>, and feel free to email me with any questions. This event is hosted at no cost to you, so I hope to see you and your colleagues there!
Sincerely, Julie Birkett VMTurbo 781-418-5270 | julie.birkett@vmturbo.com
